00038         #include <smalloc.h>

00043     }
00044 #else
00045 #error Unsupported GMX version
00046 #endif
00047     // this one is needed because of bool is defined in one of the headers included by gmx
00048     #undef bool
00049 
00050 namespace votca { namespace csg {
00051 
00052 bool GMXTopologyReader::ReadTopology(string file, Topology &top)
00053 { 
00054     gmx_mtop_t mtop;
00055 
00056     int natoms;
00057     // cleanup topology to store new data
00058     top.Cleanup();
00059 
00060 #if GMX == 45
00061     t_inputrec ir;
00062     ::matrix gbox;
00063 
00064     (void)read_tpx((char *)file.c_str(),&ir,gbox,&natoms,NULL,NULL,NULL,&mtop);
00065 #elif GMX == 40
00066     int sss;   // wtf is this
00067     ::real    ttt,lll; // wtf is this
00068     (void)read_tpx((char *)file.c_str(),&sss,&ttt,&lll,NULL,NULL,&natoms,NULL,NULL,NULL,&mtop);
00069 #else
00070 #error Unsupported GMX version
00071 #endif
00072 
00073     int count=0;
00074     for(int iblock=0; iblock<mtop.nmolblock; ++iblock)
00075         count+=mtop.molblock[iblock].nmol;
00076 
00077     if(count != mtop.mols.nr  ) {
00078         throw runtime_error("gromacs topology contains inconsistency in molecule definitons\n\n"
00079                 "A possible reason is an outdated .tpr file. Please rerun grompp to generate a new tpr file.\n"
00080                 "If the problem remains or "
00081                 "you're missing the files to rerun grompp,\ncontact the votca mailing list for a solution.");
00082     }
00083 
00084     for(int iblock=0; iblock<mtop.nmolblock; ++iblock) {
00085         gmx_moltype_t *mol
00086                 = &(mtop.moltype[mtop.molblock[iblock].type]);
00087 
00088         string molname =  *(mol->name);
00089 
00090         int res_offset = top.ResidueCount();
00091 
00092         t_atoms *atoms=&(mol->atoms);
00093 
00094         for(int i=0; i < atoms->nres; i++) {
00095 #if GMX == 45
00096                 top.CreateResidue(*(atoms->resinfo[i].name));
00097 #elif GMX == 40
00098                 top.CreateResidue(*(atoms->resname[i]));
00099 #else
00100 #error Unsupported GMX version
00101 #endif
00102         }
00103 
00104 
00105         for(int imol=0; imol<mtop.molblock[iblock].nmol; ++imol) {
00106             Molecule *mi = top.CreateMolecule(molname);
00107 
00108             // read the atoms
00109             for(int iatom=0; iatom<mtop.molblock[iblock].natoms_mol; iatom++) {
00110                 t_atom *a = &(atoms->atom[iatom]);
00111 
00112                 BeadType *type = top.GetOrCreateBeadType(*(atoms->atomtype[iatom]));
00113 #if GMX == 45
00114                 Bead *bead = top.CreateBead(1, *(atoms->atomname[iatom]), type, a->resind, a->m, a->q);
00115 #elif GMX == 40
00116                 Bead *bead = top.CreateBead(1, *(atoms->atomname[iatom]), type, a->resnr, a->m, a->q);
00117 #else
00118 #error Unsupported GMX version
00119 #endif
00120 
00121                 stringstream nm;
00122                 nm << bead->getResnr() + 1 << ":" <<  top.getResidue(res_offset + bead->getResnr())->getName() << ":" << bead->getName();
00123                 mi->AddBead(bead, nm.str());
00124             }
00125         }
00126     }
00127 
00128     return true;
00129 }
